'''Giselle Toussant''' was the wife of [[Omar Toussant]]. She was infected with the plague. Soon after, she passed away.

==History==
===Plague Exposure===
At some point, Giselle came into contact with someone who had the plague.

===Hospitalization===
When Giselle and her husband got sick, they decided to go to the hospital. She was feeling better, so she drove. On the way, they got in a car accident and she injured her head. Her dura was lacerated, so she was taken into surgery. Derek was able to repair the damage, but shortly after her surgery, she was moved into isolation because she'd been exposed to the plague and was showing symptoms. Having the plague limited her ability to heal and she ultimately succumbed to her injuries.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She was married to [[Omar Toussant]] until her death.

==Notes and Trivia==
*She was 42 when she died.
